Package org.grobid.core.utilities

Interface Summary
GrobidPropertyKeys This class contains all the keys of the properties files.
TeiValues  
 

Class Summary
Consolidation Class for managing the extraction of bibliographical informations from pdf documents.
GornIndex Index to compute a gorn index while parsing a xml document.
GrobidProperties This class loads contains all names of grobid-properties and provide methods to load grobid-properties from a property file.
GrobidTimer GrobidTimer is a timer that can memorize multiple stop times.
KeyGen Generate a random key.
LanguageUtilities Class for using language guessers (singleton).
LevenshteinDistanceAligment<E> Distance and aligment of strings based on Levenshtein edit distances using the standard Dynamic Programming algorithm.
OffsetPosition  
SHA1 Hash a string using sha1.
TextUtilities Class for holding static methods for text processing.
Utilities Some utilities methods that I don't know where to put.
XmlUtils  
XMLWriter Utility class to write some XML.
